# Portfolio Website - Project Setup

## Project Overview
A clean, minimalistic portfolio website for a fresher backend developer built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and React Router.

## Completed Steps
✅ Created .github/copilot-instructions.md
✅ Scaffolded React Vite project
✅ Installed React Router and Tailwind CSS dependencies
✅ Configured Tailwind CSS with PostCSS
✅ Created folder structure (pages/, components/)
✅ Setup React Router with multi-page routing
✅ Created page components (Home, About, Projects, Skills, Contact)
✅ Created reusable components (Navbar, Footer, ProjectCard)
✅ Applied minimalistic styling with Tailwind (neutral gray colors)
✅ Tested and verified build (npm run build successful)
✅ Started development server at http://localhost:5173/

## Project Structure
```
portfolio/
├── src/
│   ├── components/
│   │   ├── Navbar.jsx
│   │   ├── Footer.jsx
│   │   └── ProjectCard.jsx
│   ├── pages/
│   │   ├── Home.jsx
│   │   ├── About.jsx
│   │   ├── Projects.jsx
│   │   ├── Skills.jsx
│   │   └── Contact.jsx
│   ├── App.jsx
│   ├── App.css
│   ├── index.css
│   └── main.jsx
├── tailwind.config.js
├── postcss.config.js
├── package.json
└── README.md
```

## Available Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## Next Steps for Customization
1. Update personal information in all page components
2. Replace project placeholders with actual projects
3. Update GitHub, LinkedIn, and email links
4. Add your resume PDF to public folder
5. Customize colors in components if needed
6. Deploy to hosting platform (Vercel, Netlify, etc.)
